Articles.Content: I had not noticed with simpler craft early in my career game, but now that I'm on to bigger vessels I've discovered that using the d-pad up & down to adjust the throttle also scrolls the staging UI up and down. I've had a couple times where this scrolled the engines I was watching off the screen

This happens with PS4 both in VAB and during flight.  It is frustrating if you're watching the fuel level waiting to stage.  Try scrolling over top of the staging and then adjusting.  Not sure if it will do just the staging and not the engines, but worth a shot. 

Far more frustrating to me is having to switch from map view and flight view during launches and having the nav ball disappear and the highlighting of Apoapsis disappear each time you switch between the two.  Launches are overly stressful because you're trying to awkwardly switch views and then dealing with the bug that zooms you all the way out of the planet on top of everything.
